description.value: Your dedication to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.The Godclaw] borders on a cleric's. You gain the cleric's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Domain Initiate] feat but must select perfection, protection, tyranny, or zeal as your domain. In addition, you can use any religious symbol of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Abadar], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Asmodeus], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Iomedae], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Irori], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Torag] as your divine focus.
